game_description: Demo of "ZOSU Castle Morgue Escape" - You awaken in a dark and spooky castle that was being used as morgue after a pandemic and must find your way out through a series of simple puzzles and mechanics, it is very dark, but fortunately you have a flashlight - This is a casual and somewhat scary escape-room/area type of game - Some events are slightly randomized for replay ability - 2 game modes: 1) 3.5 minute demo time limit in the dark mode 2) Exploration mode with puzzles off, light on, and no timer
